mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( pro_Name,pro_Type, pro_Num,pro_State, pro_fontTiltOne,pro_info, pro_file, pro_finger, pro_driver, pro_video, pro_fontTiltTwo,pro_backTiltOne, pro_backTiltTwo,pro_font,pro_back, createdUser, createdTime, modifiedUser, modifiedTime ) VALUE ( #{pro_Name}, #{pro_Type}, #{pro_Num}, #{pro_State}, #{pro_fontTiltOne}, #{pro_info}, #{pro_file}, #{pro_finger}, #{pro_driver}, #{pro_video}, #{pro_fontTiltTwo},#{pro_backTiltOne}, #{pro_backTiltTwo},#{pro_font},#{pro_back}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product where pro_Name like concat('%',#{pro_Name},'%') and pro_State like concat('%',#{pro_State},'%') and pro_Type like concat('%',#{pro_Type},'%') Limit #{startPage},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET pro_Name=#{pro_Name},pro_Type=#{pro_Type}, pro_Num=#{pro_Num}, pro_State=#{pro_State}, pro_info=#{pro_info}, pro_fontTiltOne=#{pro_fontTiltOne}, pro_file=#{pro_file}, pro_finger=#{pro_finger}, pro_driver=#{pro_driver}, pro_video=#{pro_video}, pro_fontTiltTwo=#{pro_fontTiltTwo}, pro_backTiltOne=#{pro_backTiltOne},pro_backTiltTwo=#{pro_backTiltTwo}, pro_font=#{pro_font},pro_back=#{pro_back}, modifiedUser=#{modifiedUser},modifiedTime=#{modifiedTime} WHERE pid=#{pid}
UPDATE product SET ${fileName}=null, modifiedUser=#{modifiedUser}, modifiedTime=#{modifiedTime} WHERE pid=#{pid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) count FROM product where pro_Name like concat('%',#{pro_Name},'%') and pro_State like concat('%',#{pro_State},'%') and pro_Type like concat('%',#{pro_Type},'%')
SELECT pro_Type FROM product group by pro_Type
